Articles.Content:
Looks like 0.90 will be getting some use for quite some time, I hope mod developers dont give up on 0.90

+1 for any continued development

EDIT: Sorry for being vague, I guess in my mind I was connecting the posts about exploding wings and other aero/heat problems

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T14:19:37Z" title="04/28/2015 02:19  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by darqen27**
Such an informative and constructive post. Given the pace that the popular mods have already updated to 1.0 I wouldn't count on that.
I feel your incredibly vague and uninformative pain, OP.

> 
> I feel your incredibly vague and uninformative pain, OP.

LOL

Finally some sympathy! ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
